quotes.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: If you get up in the morning and think the future is going to be better, it is a bright day. Otherwise, it's not.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: Accept the terrible responsibility of life with eyes wide open.
quotes.author: Jordon Peterson

quotes.quote: Have respect for yourself. Have fear for yourself.
quotes.author: Jordon Peterson

quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: It's better to be a pirate than to join the Navy
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Hard work is behind the scenes competition is an easy part.
quotes.author: Usain Bolt

quotes.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in, and day-out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: Don’t worry about failure; you only have to be right once.
quotes.author: Drew Houston

quotes.quote: Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I don’t measure a man’s success by how high he climbs but how high he bounces when he hits bottom.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: Don’t aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.
quotes.author: David Frost
